title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 707 of 2007) (as
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Technical
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Sea-Fisheries (Technical 

Measures) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited sea-fisheries (technical measures) regulation 2020

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 707 of 2007) (as
heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations “Commission Implementing Regulation” means
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations “Commission Implementing Regulation” means 

Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/967 of 3 July 2020; 

(2) A word or expression that is used in the Commission Implementing 
Regulation and is also used in these Regulations, has, unless the context 
otherwise requires, the same meaning in these Regulations as it has in the 
Commission Implementing Regulation.
text_norm: 2 (1) regulation commission implementing regulation mean commission implementing regulation (eu) 2020 967 3 july 2020 (2) word expression used commission implementing regulation also used regulation unless context otherwise requires meaning regulation commission implementing regulation

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 707 of 2007) (as
heading: 3. The master of-
text_raw:
3. The master of- 

(a) 

(b) 

an Irish sea-fishing boat wherever it may be, or 

a sea-fishing boat in the exclusive fishing limits of the State, 

shall comply with Article 2 of the Commission Implementing Regulation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

10 October, 2020. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

1 OJ L213, 6.7.20, p. 4 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 16th October, 2020.

title: Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 2007 (S.I. No. 707 of 2007) (as
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations give effect to Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 
2020/967 of 3 July 2020 and make a contravention of provisions of that 
Implementing Regulation an offence under the Sea-Fisheries and Maritime 
Jurisdiction Act 2006. 

Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/967 lays down the detailed 
rules on the signal and implementation characteristics of acoustic deterrent 
devices as referred to in Part A of Annex XIII of Regulation (EU) 2019/1241 of 
the European Parliament and of the Council on the conservation of fisheries 
resources and the protection of marine ecosystems through technical measures. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [440]
